articles.author: By SUMMER BALLENTINE Associated Press
articles.title: Missouri Democrats hope minimum wage measure helps McCaskill
articles.description: JEFFERSON CITY, Mo. (AP) — Democrats hope a ballot proposal to hike Missouri's minimum wage will boost support for Sen. Claire McCaskill's re-election, a seat Republicans are targeting as a top opportunity to insulate their Senate majority.

articles.title: WR trio will have to pick up slack at No. 4 Wisconsin
articles.description: MADISON, Wis. (AP) — The suspension of Quintez Cephus leaves Wisconsin without one of its top receivers for the foreseeable future.

articles.title: Editorial Roundup: Recent editorials in Arkansas newspapers
articles.description: Here are excerpts from recent editorials in Arkansas newspapers:

articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/DailyMailCeleb
articles.title: Beverley Knight defends her casting of Emmeline Pankurst in a musical
articles.description: Speaking to Christine Lampard on Tuesday's Lorraine, the singer, 45, said the play - entitled Sylvia - is faithful to the suffragette's history in the script, but that people 'need to chill' over her role.

articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/DailyMailCeleb
articles.title: Great British Bake Off winners: Where are they now?
articles.description: A new season of Great British Bake Off is coming to Channel 4, which means a new winner will be crowned. Before we get that far, let's take a look at those who have come out of the tent winners.

articles.author: Justin Caruso
articles.title: Chelsea Handler: ‘We Need To Take To The Streets’ To Protect Abortion
articles.description: Comedian Chelsea Handler called for people to "take to the streets" to protect abortion rights Monday in a new press release in conjunction with NARAL Pro-Choice America.

articles.author: Warner Todd Huston
articles.title: Sen. Ted Cruz Slams Opponent for Supporting NFL Anthem Protesters
articles.description: Senator Ted Cruz (R-TX) slammed his Democrat opponent recently, for supporting the National Football League's player protests during the playing of the national anthem.

articles.author: Justin Caruso
articles.title: Kathy Griffin: If ICE Is Deporting Nazis, ‘Can they Head over to the White House?’
articles.description: Comedian Kathy Griffin tweeted Tuesday, "If ICE is in the business of removing despicable Nazis can they please head over to the White House?"after President Trump ordered the deportation of Nazi collaborator Jakiw Palij.

articles.author: Breitbart News
articles.title: Exclusive Excerpt from Ann Coulter’s ‘Resistance is Futile!’ — Trump Is Hitler Times Infinity
articles.description: What follows is an exclusive selection from bestselling conservative author and columnist Ann Coulter's latest effort: Resistance is Futile! How the Trump-Hating Left Lost Its Collective Mind, in bookstores Tuesday.

articles.author: Tom Ciccotta
articles.title: Rutgers Sanctions Professor for ‘Caucasian A**holes’ Rant
articles.description: Rutgers professor James Livingston has officially been sanctioned by the university for a series of anti-white Facebook rants made earlier this year. Campus free speech group FIRE is defending the embattled professor from the university.

articles.author: John J. Xenakis
articles.title: World View: Islamic State Claims Coordinated Attacks Across Russia’s Chechnya
articles.description: Contents: ISIS claims credit for coordinated attacks across Russia's Chechnya region; Brief generational history of Chechnya

articles.author: John Hayward
articles.title: Chinese Muslims Face Persecution as Eid Holiday Begins
articles.description: China’s predominantly Muslim Uighur minority will spend the 2018 Eid al-Fitr holiday season fleeing persecution in Xinjiang province and calling attention to the plight of their families back home.

articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/DailyMail
articles.title: Yazidi sex slave who fled from ISIS is set to marry the man who helped her overcome her ordeal
articles.description: Nadia Murad was repeatedly beaten and gang-raped by fanatics after being kidnapped at the age of 21 from her village in northern Iraq in 2014.

articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/DailyMail
articles.title: Corbyn refuses to back tougher sanctions against Russia
articles.description: The Labour leader instead urged a 'serious dialogue' with Vladimir Putin in the wake of the Salisbury nerve agent outrage.

articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/DailyMail
articles.title: Daily Mail investigation reveals soft justice across the UK in week-long survey
articles.description: Damning evidence of how soft justice is handed out at courts can be revealed after a Daily Mail investigation into sentencing hearings at 12 courts across the UK.

articles.author: Jonathan Drake
articles.title: Protesters topple Confederate soldier statue in North Carolina
articles.description: Protesters toppled a statue of a Confederate soldier on the campus of University of North Carolina on Monday, the latest move to dismantle Civil War symbols amid a fierce debate about race and the legacy of slavery in the United States.

articles.author: Prak Chan Thul
articles.title: Two Cambodian journalists facing spying charges freed on bail
articles.description: Two Cambodian journalists charged with espionage for filing news reports to a U.S.-funded radio station were freed on bail on Tuesday, in a move seen by a rights group as a government bid to improve its image weeks after a disputed election.

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Cambodian reporters charged with spying granted bail
articles.description: Two Cambodian journalists who had worked for U.S.-funded Radio Free Asia and are charged with espionage were released Tuesday on bail, a day after a pardon freed four land rights activists from prison.
